rukus.text: My poslaly (kur'yery) do spilʹnot pered tym, yak vy, ta my stavymo yikh do testu cherez neshchastya ta neharazdy, shcho vony mozhutʹ blahaty
Yakby tilʹky vony blahaly koly nash test afflicted yim! Zamistʹ tsʹoho, yikhni serdenʹka buly zatverdili, ta chort prykrasyv yikhni pratsi u yikhnikh ochakh

Koly vony takym chynom disregard povidomlennya dane yim, my vidkryvayemo dlya nykh bramy vse. Todi, tilʹky tomu shcho vony tishatʹsya z shcho davalysʹ yim, my karayemo yikh raptom; vony stayutʹ nadzvychayno ohlusheni
bezputnyy takym chynom vynyshchuyutʹsya. Pokhvalitʹ musytʹ BOH, Lord vsesvitu

Kazhutʹ, "Shcho yakshcho BOH zabrav vashe slukhannya ta vash zir, ta opechatav vashi rozum; kotryy boh, za vynyatkom BOHA, mozhe restavruvaty ts dlya vas?" Prymitka yak my roz'yasnyuyemo apokalipsys, ta prymitku yak vony dosi deviate
Kazhete, "Shcho yakshcho BOZHYY retribution prybuv do vas raptom, abo pislya oholoshennya, tse ne bezputnyy khto zaznayete znyshchennya
My ne posylayemo kur'yeram krim tomu shcho deliverers harnoyi novyny, tak zhe, yak i warners. Tsey khto vvazhayutʹ ta reforma nichoho ne bo, ne bude vony sumuyutʹ
Yak dlya tsykh khto vidkhylyayutʹ nashi vidkryttya, vony zaznayutʹ retribution dlya yikhnʹoho wickedness

Kazhu, "ya ne skazhu vam shcho ya volodiyu skarbamy BOHA. Ne robyty ya znayu maybutnye. Ne robyty ya skazhu vam shcho ya ye anhel. YA prosto slidkuyu shcho vidkryvayetʹsya do meni." Skazhitʹ, "Yavlyayte soboyu slipyy toy zhe tomu shcho seer? Vy ne viddzerkalyuyete
